column2: IP addresses linked to the New York Police Department have been used to sanitize Wikipedia entries about cases of police brutality.
An inmate once escaped prison, once out, he began posting photos of himself mocking the police on Facebook which led police straight to him.

Meditation helps people be more virtuous and compassionate, according to a study.

Limerence = The technical term for having a crush on a person.
Too much homework can cause stress, depression and even lower grades.
Love has nothing to do with your heart, it's all chemical reactions inside of your brain.
If you still talk about it, you still care.
There's always gonna be that one girl who is prettier than you, you'll just have to find that one boy who doesn't care.
